mapper.sql: event_seq AS eventSeq, user_id AS userId, event_nm AS eventNm, content, capacity, movie_info AS movieInfo, TO_CHAR(start_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') startDt, TO_CHAR(end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') endDt, location, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YY/MM/DD HH24MISS') regDt, TO_CHAR(target_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') targetDt, reg_id AS regId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event ( event_seq, user_id, event_nm, content, capacity, movie_info, start_dt, end_dt, location, reg_dt, target_dt, reg_id, genre ) VALUES ( #{eventSeq}, #{userId}, #{eventNm}, #{content}, #{capacity}, #{movieInfo}, TO_DATE('','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE('','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{location}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE('','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{regId}, #{genre} )
